TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinkedListNode`1<T> extends System.Object

Docs.typeparam: Specifies the element type of the linked list.
Docs.summary: Represents a node in a . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each element of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601> collection is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedListNode%601>. The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedListNode%601> contains a value, a reference to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601> that it belongs to, a reference to the next node, and a reference to the previous node.
## Examples The following code example creates a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedListNode%601>, adds it to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601>, and tracks the values of its properties as the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList%601> changes.
